heading: super
subheading: you'd like to be holding a betting slip from september pitting the tennessee titans against the st. louis rams in super bowl xxxiv, because you'd be living large right now. tennessee advanced to the big dance with a 33-14 afc championship win over jacksonville, then the rams hung on to win a grim defensive struggle to take the nfc title game from tampa bay, 11-6. nobody, but nobody, could've predicted this.
author: wired staff
text: you'd like to be holding a betting slip from september pitting the tennessee titans against the st. louis rams in super bowl xxxiv, because you'd be living large right now. tennessee advanced to the big dance with a 33-14 afc championship win over jacksonville, then the rams hung on to win a grim defensive struggle to take the nfc title game from tampa bay, 11-6. nobody, but nobody, could've predicted this.
